description: Jason Richards loves everything about the apartment Elye Black has shown him, but with a waiting list longer than the number of available units, Jason realizes it's going to take some creative fenagling to move in. Elye is willing to bump Jason up the list, but not without getting something in return. Jason realizes where Elye is going with this and tells him his boyfriend wouldn't like it. Elye tells him he doesn't have to know, and seeks to consult Jason's 'better half'. Jason's dick is already betraying his intentions, as his semi-chub grows to full hard on as Elye takes it in his mouth. Sucking him off, Elye strips out of his clothes and tells Jason to do the same. Jason proves he's worth the effort as he bends Elye over, filling him up with his hard, warm cock. He fucks Elye all over the apartment, unleashing his load all over Elye as the two of them agree to keep this their little secret.Enjoy!
title: The Better Half
